guide.introduction: This guide will break down how to make this top into such easy steps that a monkey could do it.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide will break down how to make this top into such easy steps that a monkey could do it.

Relevant parts
  • Small Electric Motor
Tools
  • Needle Nose Pliers
  • Small Flathead Screwdriver
  • Wire cutter/stripper

lines.text: First, you'll need one of these small electric motors.
lines.text_raw: First, you'll need one of these small electric motors.

lines.text: You can purchase one here, but they're pretty common so check your junk box first.
lines.text_raw: You can purchase one [http://www.radioshack.com/product/index.jsp?productId=2911245|here], but they're pretty common so check your junk box first.

lines.text: Use a small screwdriver or pair of pliers to move these tabs and remove the plastic endcap.
lines.text_raw: Use a small screwdriver or pair of pliers to move these tabs and remove the plastic endcap.

lines.text: Remove the armature from the casing.
lines.text_raw: Remove the armature from the casing.

lines.text: You can discard the endcap and metal shell, but you may want to save the magnets inside of it for future use.
lines.text_raw: You can discard the endcap and metal shell, but you may want to save the magnets inside of it for future use.

lines.text: Snip at the copper wire with wire cutters and unravel it from the armature.
lines.text_raw: Snip at the copper wire with wire cutters and unravel it from the armature.

lines.text: Remove any spacers or the excess materials from the armature.
lines.text_raw: Remove any spacers or the excess materials from the armature.

lines.text: Rotate the first and last metal pieces to keep the others from moving.
lines.text_raw: Rotate the first and last metal pieces to keep the others from moving.

lines.text: This also makes it look cooler.
lines.text_raw: This also makes it look cooler.

lines.text: To spin the top place shaft between your pointer finger and thumb and move them in opposite directions.
lines.text_raw: To spin the top place shaft between your pointer finger and thumb and move them in opposite directions.

lines.text: Enjoy your new and very cool toy!
lines.text_raw: Enjoy your new and very cool toy!
